title: ralph-setup wizard enhancement for MCPs
description: Enhance ralph-setup wizard to configure MCPs per project, select from mcpDefinitions, and migrate .env secrets to 1Password refs.

acceptanceCriteria.text: ralph-setup shows 'Configure MCPs' option in main menu
Configure project: select MCPs from available mcpDefinitions
Scan .env: offers to migrate secrets to 1Password refs
Manage MCPs: add new MCP definitions to registry
View registry: pretty-print current project configs
